overview:
Priit is heavily involved in assessing all of ASI’s new technology investments.

Before ASI, Priit played an integral role in developing Kazaa and later Skype; indeed, he continues to work at Skype as a core library developer.

While cryptography and data communication are his areas of expertise, his other passion is computer game development. Together with Ahti and Jaan, he wrote the first Estonian commercial computer game, Kosmonaut.

When he isn’t using his innate ability to solve complex technical problems, Priit enjoys good company, gourmet restaurants and biking.

He holds a degree in automation and system technology from Tallinn University of Technology.
